Essentia Water is a brand of alkaline water with a pH level of around 9.5. 
 Essentia Water is infused with electrolytes such as sodium, potassium, calcium, and magnesium, which are important for maintaining proper hydration and supporting healthy muscles, nerves, and heart function. 

 These minerals also help to balance the body's pH level and may improve overall health and well-being.

Fiji Water is a brand of natural artesian water with a pH level of around 7.7-8.5. It is considered to be slightly alkaline, which can help to neutralize acid in the body and promote better digestion. \n\n Fiji Water contains a variety of minerals such as calcium, magnesium, and silica, which are important for maintaining healthy bones, muscles, and skin.

Poland Spring is a brand of natural spring water with a pH level of around 7.2-7.6. \n\n Poland Spring contains minerals such as calcium, magnesium, and potassium, which are important for maintaining healthy bones, muscles, and nerves.
